name: Give Me Space
description:
My game for LD 42! 

If you encounter any bugs, comment below!

NOTICE: The NEW exe has a few bug fixes. The old is only up to show what I fixed. 

Please go vote on Ludu Dare if you can!

Written Tutorial:

Click on the right side of the screen (where the planet info is). This will let you pick up the planet/moon. Once you've picked it up, move your cursor towards the sun until you see the planet. Click when you are ready to place.  Make sure the planets don't collide, and make sure to read their information!
